name: Daemon Ward
book: Pathfinder Campaign Setting: Horsemen of the Apocalypse: Book of the Damned, Vol. 3 © 2011, Paizo Publishing, LLC
components: V, S, M (50 gp worth of powdered silver)
text: This spell functions like death ward, except as noted above and it only protects against these attacks from daemons.
components_zh: 语言、姿势、材料 (价值50金币的银粉末)
text_zh: 本法术的效果如同防死结界，除了上述的纪载，并且只在对抗来自邪魔的攻击时提供保护。
